      • initTask

        private void initTask(int id)
        check if the id matches with an existing object. If so, fetches it from Realm if not (-1), creates a new Task

      • checkIfDateBefore

        private void checkIfDateBefore(java.util.Calendar calendar)
        Checks if the "TO" Date is not before the "FROM" Date. If so, changes the "FROM" Date to be one day before the "TO" Date
        Parameters:
        calendar - Calendar object for the "FROM" Date of the Task

      • checkIfDateAfter

        private void checkIfDateAfter(java.util.Calendar calendar)
        Checks if the "FROM" Date is not after the "TO" Date. If so, changes the "TO" Date to be one day after the "FROM" Date
        Parameters:
        calendar - Calendar object for the "TO" Date of the Task
